meanings.definition: A molecule consisting of three identical monomers.
meanings.sent1: The trimer formed by combining three monomers is very stable.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the trimer to understand its unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The trimer of friends always stuck together like glue.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the trimer of trees stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The trimer structure was easy to visualize with building blocks.

meanings.definition: A group of three similar things or people.
meanings.sent1: The trimer of siblings enjoyed playing together in the park.
meanings.sent2: The trimer of birds flew in perfect harmony across the sky.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the trimer of cakes disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The trimer of colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent5: The trimer of puppies wagged their tails in excitement.
